code:
import turtle
import datetime as dt

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("white")

t = turtle.Turtle()
t.goto(0,10)

hr = dt.datetime.now().hour
mn = dt.datetime.now().minute
sec = dt.datetime.now().second

t.write(
str(hr).zfill(2)+":"
+str(mn).zfill(2)+":"
+str(sec).zfill(2),
font =("Arial Narrow", 35, "bold"))
